title: Add suppor to Bluetooth on WSL
body: Exposing bluetooth to the WSL is necessary to develop IoT without having ot fire up a Viertual Machine.

comments.body: Great,,, all This port need now,,, all That register have,,, all  Then armature ligature,,,  all conception Lost,,,
I would be able to use all the BlueZ API.
Would like to be able to discover Bluetooth LE devices and query their characteristics.
You want access to the hardware then. I believe there are several asks for that in various forms. Vote for those instead.
